--- title: "Creator Overview Performance H22023" author: "Vi Duong" date: "2024-03-20" format: html: embed-resources: false toc: true number-sections: true theme: Yeti fontsize: 1.1em linestretch: 1.7 ---
Assumption and Data Sources
Currency Unit: million VND (mil VND) Data Source: + gmv_nmv + paid_sales_order + unpaid_sales_order # Executive Summary **Key Findings:** - Creator Impact on Revenue: Creator type significantly impacts revenue generation. Creators with no commission sharing contribute the highest average GMV (2.4 billion VND) but minimal commission (2.5%) to MeLive. - Top Performers: Our analysis identified 76 "A class" creators (20%) contributing a substantial 90% of total NMV. Notably, this group includes creators from all three categories – no commission sharing, full management, and partners. - Full Management Potential: While only 3 out of 6 full-management creators are currently classified as "A class," their presence highlights the potential for high performance, low cancellation rates, and strong commission generation within this category. - Category Focus: An analysis of top NMV creators reveals a lack of category diversification, with most focusing on a single dominant category (except Vu Duy and Linh An). # Revenue Source: gmv_nmv - There's a significant difference in GMV generated by different creator types. Creators with no commission sharing generated an average of 2.4 billion VND each over six months, which is double the average GMV of both full-time creators and partner creators. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} Table: Revenue By Creator Type creator_type total_gmv total_est_gmv total_nmv no_creators gmv_contrib nmv_over_gmv gmv_per_creator ----------------------- ---------- -------------- ---------- ------------ ------------ ------------- ---------------- creator_no_sharing_fee 49,219 53,761 11,698 22 12.4% 23.8% 2,444 full_management 4,681 6,071 3,919 6 1.4% 83.7% 1,012 partner 325,786 373,190 185,498 340 86.2% 56.9% 1,098 Total 379,685 433,021 201,115 368 100.0% 53.0% 1,177 ::: ::: ## Segment - While Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) data may have limitations in accuracy, the Net Merchandise Value (NMV) will be used as the primary KPI for evaluating performance across different creator types due to variations in the NMV/GMV ratio. - An analysis of creator classification reveals that 76 creators (20%) fall into the top-performing "A class," contributing to a significant 90% of total NMV. Notably, this group includes 3 creators from both the "no commission sharing" and "full management" categories. - While only 3 out of 6 full-management creators are classified as "A class," their presence in this top tier emphasizes the potential for this creator type to achieve excellent performance with low cancellation rates and high commission generation. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} Table: Number Of Creators By Segment abcclass no_creators percent_no_creators creator_type nmv avg_no_seller avg_nmv_per_creator_month avg_nmv_per_seller_month --------- ------------ -------------------- ----------------------- -------- -------------- -------------------------- ------------------------- A 3 0.8% creator_no_sharing_fee 10,103 20 875 52 A 3 0.8% full_management 3,467 47 193 4 A 70 19.0% partner 167,463 64 554 53 B 3 0.8% creator_no_sharing_fee 1,072 24 60 3 B 1 0.3% full_management 365 54 61 1 B 26 7.1% partner 8,589 43 70 2 C 16 4.3% creator_no_sharing_fee 523 30 11 1 C 2 0.5% full_management 87 14 9 1 C 244 66.3% partner 9,446 14 11 1 ::: ::: ## By Category ### Top Creator With Category - An analysis of the top 30 creators ranked by Net Merchandise Value (NMV) reveals that, with the exception of Vu Duy and Linh An, all other creators appear to focus on a single dominant category. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} Table: Top 30 creators and category creator Chăm sóc sắc đẹp & Chăm sóc cá nhân Unknown Trang phục nam & Đồ lót Giày ----------------------- ------------------------------------ -------- ------------------------ ------ vuduy2412 11,018 1,573 0 0 phuong.hxx 0 10,565 0 0 linhan.1998 0 0 8,957 2,690 bedangbae 7,849 0 0 0 skincaredungcach.byson 7,081 0 0 0 solsolunnie2 5,584 0 0 0 lamatuyen 0 4,691 0 0 trinhmeow.vlogger 4,660 0 0 0 gia.hanne__ 3,612 0 0 0 vanhlamdep 3,551 0 0 0 im.lukedo 3,437 0 0 0 rinprinday 0 0 3,361 0 doduynamm 3,123 0 0 0 huunghiale0304 0 0 2,944 0 harrydailyyy 2,928 0 0 0 baclynne 2,811 0 0 0 vitamin.phong 2,639 0 0 0 regods.club 0 0 2,635 0 tphat2105 0 0 2,541 0 vincenz2310 0 0 2,022 0 huaquocanh99 1,793 0 0 0 foxiereview 1,787 0 0 0 de_boycatao 0 0 1,759 0 baclynofficial 1,726 0 0 0 swatchesbybaobao 0 0 1,654 0 bigsizenam 0 1,639 0 0 lam.park12 0 0 1,629 0 phnghw 0 0 1,518 0 ::: ::: # Commission Source: sales_order **Commission Structure by Creator Type** - **Creator No Sharing Fee:** While these creators contribute significantly to GMV (12.4%), their commission to MeLive is minimal (2.5%) because they do not share revenue. Additionally, they generate the lowest average commission per seller (5.8%) compared to other creator types. In a single livestream, the average commission earned by MeLive from a Creator No Sharing Fee is only 140,000 VND. - **Full Management Creators:** Despite a lower contribution to GMV (1.4%), full management creators generate a higher commission share for MeLive (6.7%) due to their employment structure. They also boast a higher average commission per seller (10.2%). Interestingly, full management creators appear to be particularly effective in livestreaming, generating an average commission of 837,000 VND for MeLive per livestream. - **Partner Creators:** These creators fall between the two extremes, contributing a healthy portion of GMV (86.2%) and generating a balanced commission rate for MeLive (around 10.2%). Their average commission per seller aligns with full management creators (10.2%) and their average commission per livestream falls in the middle (308,000 VND). ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} Table: Sales Order By Creator Type P1 creator_type total_gmv gmv_contribution total_nmv qty_sold no_gmv_orders no_nmv_orders commission melive_commission creator_commission no_livestreams no_products ----------------------- ---------- ----------------- ---------- ---------- -------------- -------------- ----------- ------------------ ------------------- --------------- ------------ creator_no_sharing_fee 20,695 7.7% 17,601 78,426 68,601 58,233 1,028 146 881 1,048 1,865 full_management 4,589 1.7% 3,927 18,538 16,639 14,196 401 401 0 479 1,599 partner 243,320 90.6% 201,667 1,275,653 1,143,614 958,334 20,473 5,407 15,066 17,538 17,801 ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} Table: Sales Order By Content Type P2 creator_type aov_gmv aov_nmv asp commission_rate melive_takerate ml_com_over_gmv ml_commission_per_livestream gmv_per_livestream ----------------------- ---------- ---------- ---------- ---------------- ---------------- ---------------- ----------------------------- ------------------- creator_no_sharing_fee 301,675.8 302,242.8 263,882.7 5.8% 14.3% 0.7% 139,775.0 19.7 full_management 275,776.6 276,604.6 247,526.5 10.2% 100.0% 8.7% 837,768.5 9.6 partner 212,764.4 210,434.8 190,741.8 10.2% 26.4% 2.2% 308,304.0 13.9 ::: :::
